front.title: Handling IPv6 Sources and Destinations in the MPLS and GMPLS TE MIB Modules

abstract.t: This document describes how to configure or monitor a Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) or Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) Traffic Engineered (TE) Label Switched Path (LSP) using the MPLS and GMPLS TE MIB module where the ingress and/or egress routers are identified using IPv6 addresses.
